com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Wait Hour
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: A wait hour of zero (0) means that a meal's portion size is calculated on as if it is affecting the rating immediately afterwards.

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Valid Hours
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: A valid hour of 24h means that a meal's portion size is seen as not having any effect on the rating 24 hours after the meal occurred.

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Min Hours between Meals
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: If the time between meals are less than this, they will be counted as one meal by algorithm. Set to zero (0) to turn this function off. (NB. Breaks has precedence so a higher hour here than the setting 'Hours after event before a break' makes no sense)
